--- select_singer_with_asterisk.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name: "Singers",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers
